translations.The announcement does not exist anymore: The announcement does not exist any more
translations.An <strong>announcement</strong> is post: An announcement is posted by an administrator
translations.The subject is too long or empty: The subject is too long or empty
translations.This app allows admins to post announcem: This app allows admins to post announcements.
translations.Announce your maintenance window 🎛️, int:
Announce your maintenance window 🎛️, introduce a new colleague 👤 or make sure everyone knows about the big event next month 📅

🖌️ Markdown support

📑 Comments including @-mentions

👪 Group permissions

⭕ Dashboard integration

⚡ Activities integration

🔔 Notifications integration
translations.An error occurred while removing the not: An error occurred while removing the notifications of the announcement

translations.Write announcement text, Markdown can be: Write announcement text, Markdown can be used …
translations.These groups will be able to see the ann: These groups will be able to see the announcement. If no group is selected, all users can see it.
translations.An error occurred while posting the anno: An error occurred while posting the announcement
translations.These groups will be able to post announ: These groups will be able to post announcements.
